comments:
Adding a jar file, external jar file or variable to the 'J2EE Module Depedencies' of an ear module adds multiple identical entries in the .component file.

Also the entries are not displayed in the list.

I forgot to say that this is happening in WTP 1.5 RC1a

I also notiched that this stack trace is displayed in the eclipse console (and not in the eclipse log file!)
